CreateSuiteDefinition.name: CreateSuiteDefinition
CreateSuiteDefinition.description: Grants permission to create a suite definition

DeleteSuiteDefinition.name: DeleteSuiteDefinition
DeleteSuiteDefinition.description: Grants permission to delete a suite definition

GetSuiteDefinition.name: GetSuiteDefinition
GetSuiteDefinition.description: Grants permission to get a suite definition

GetSuiteRun.name: GetSuiteRun
GetSuiteRun.description: Grants permission to get a suite run

GetSuiteRunReport.name: GetSuiteRunReport
GetSuiteRunReport.description: Grants permission to get the qualification report for a suite run

ListSuiteDefinitions.name: ListSuiteDefinitions
ListSuiteDefinitions.description: Grants permission to list suite definitions

ListSuiteRuns.name: ListSuiteRuns
ListSuiteRuns.description: Grants permission to list suite runs

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags (metadata) assigned to a resource

StartSuiteRun.name: StartSuiteRun
StartSuiteRun.description: Grants permission to start a suite run

StopSuiteRun.name: StopSuiteRun
StopSuiteRun.description: Grants permission to stop a suite run

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description:
Grants permission to add to or modify the tags of the given resource. Tags are metadata
                                                which can be used to manage a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove the given tags (metadata) from a resource

UpdateSuiteDefinition.name: UpdateSuiteDefinition
UpdateSuiteDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a suite definition
